Translations.Text: Nihsansaya, duracari lokanca karma-lekha ‘sijjina’ madhye ahe
Tumhala kaya mahita ‘sijjina’ kaya ahe
(Ha tara) likhita grantha ahe
Tya divasi khote uthavinaryanci mothi durdasa ahe
Je mobadala ani siksecya divasala khote tharavitata
Yala phakta toca khote tharavito, jo maryadece ullanghana karanara ani aparadhi asato
Jevha tyacyasamora amacya ayati vacalya jatata tevha to mhanato ki he tara purvicya lokance kis'se aheta
Ase nahi, kimbahuna tyancya manavara tyancya karmammule ganja (cadhalela) ahe
Evadheca nahi. He loka tya divasi apalya palanakartyacya darsanapasuna vancita thevale jatila
Maga ya lokanna niscitapane jahannamamadhye phekuna dile ja'ila
Maga tyanna sangitale ja'ila ki heca ahe te, jyala tumhi khote tharavita rahile
Nihsansaya, satkarmi lokanca karma-lekha ‘illiyina’ madhye ahe
Tumhala kaya mahita ki ‘illiyina’ kaya ahe
(To tara) likhita grantha ahe
Allahace nikatavarti (phariste) hajara asatata
Nihsansaya, neka sadacari loka (mothya) sukha-samadhanata asatila
Asananvara basuna pahata asatila
Tumhi tyancya ceharyavarunaca (allahacya) krpa denagyanci praphullata olakhala
Ya lokanna sud'dha nirbhela madya pajale ja'ila
Jyavara kasturici mohara lagali asela. Iccha karanaryanni tyacica iccha keli pahije
Ani tyata ‘tasnima’ce misrana asela
(Arthata) to jhara, jyace pani, allahace sannidhya labhalele loka pitila
Nihsansaya, aparadhi loka imana rakhanarya lokanci thatta udavita asata
Ani tyancya javaluna jatana netra kataksa (va isaryane) tyaca apamana karita asata
Ani jevha apalya lokankade parata yeta, tevha thatta - maskari karita asata
Ani jevha tyanna pahata, tevha ase mhanata, niscitaca he loka vata cukalele aheta
Yanna, tyacyavara niriksaka banavuna tara nahi pathavile gele
Tevha aja imana rakhanare ya inkari lokanvara hasatila
